Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Kafkan Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Kafkan Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: On the southwest corner of this intersection, you can see the large castle known as Keslar's Palace standing high on the ridge above. The entrance to the palace consists of a narrow, winding road up the hill on Kafkan Way. Leviathan Drive continues to the north and south, intersecting Kafkan Way, running east to west.
